title: Important Update: CBIC Advisory on HSNS Declaration Filing Procedure
content:
# Important Update: CBIC Advisory on HSNS Declaration Filing Procedure

Ek important update hai HSNS Cess Registered Persons ke liye. Government ne **Advisory No. 04/2026 dated February 09, 2026** announce ki hai, jo HSNS (Health Security & National Security) Cess ke liye HSN Declaration filing procedure ko detail karti hai. Is advisory ka aim hai registered persons ke liye Form HSNS DEC-01 file karne ki prakriya ko clear karna.

### Key Highlights of the Advisory:

*   **Advisory Details:** This is Advisory No. 04/2026, issued on February 09, 2026.
*   **Purpose:** The advisory outlines a step-by-step procedure for filing the HSNS Declaration in Form HSNS DEC-01.
*   **Accessing the Portal:** All HSNS Cess related functionalities, including filing declarations, are available on the dedicated portal: www.cbic-gst.gov.in.
*   **Filing Procedure:**
    *   Taxpayers need to log in to the HSNS Cess portal.
    *   Navigate to **Menu > HSNS DECLARATION > HSNS File Declaration**.
    *   The Form HSNS DEC-01 will appear, where the 'Declaration Type' will be shown as 'Initial Declaration' for the first-time filing.
    *   Registered persons must fill in their "Basic Information" (like HSNS Registration No., Legal Name, Address) and "Goods Manufactured" details.
    *   Provision for uploading up to five supporting documents, each not exceeding 2 MB, is available.
    *   The declaration must be verified by an Authorized Signatory.
*   **Viewing Filed Declarations:** After successful submission, the filed declaration can be viewed under **Menu > HSNS DECLARATION > HSNS VIEW DECLARATION**. Here, the 'Unique Machine Registration Number' generated by the system will also be visible.

This advisory ensures a smooth and clear process for HSNS Cess registered persons to comply with their HSN declaration requirements.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Download the Official Notification/Circular here](https://www.cbic-gst.gov.in/)

*(You can find Advisory No. 04/2026 dated 09.02.2026 on HSNS Declaration filing Procedure for HSNS Cess Registered person under "HSNS > HSNS CESS Legislation" section on the CBIC-GST portal.)*

*Published on: 10 February 2026*
